content: Client confidentiality: all case documents stored in encrypted servers. No sharing without explicit consent.
metadata: Effective date: 2025-01-01, policy code: CONF-01, revised annually

content: Conflict of interest checks required for new clients. Full disclosure if any prior representation conflicts.
metadata: Policy code: COI-2025, references state bar rule 1.7

content: Billing transparency: itemized invoices, no hidden fees. Must provide payment plan options if needed.
metadata: Policy code: BILL-CLAR, cross-referenced with retainer templates

content: Data retention: keep closed case files for 7 years, then secure shred or archive digitally.
metadata: Policy code: RET-7, updated 2025-02, compliance with local bar rules

content: Mandatory pro bono hours: each attorney to log 20 hours/year. Exempt for part-time staff.
metadata: Policy code: PB-20, verified by HR annually
